Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering its true value, I propose a special introductory offer of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece that not only fulfills your requirements but also adds significant value to your collection or operations. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if there's any way I can assist you in making your decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
